page.title: 12TRADE
page.content: Havant has two main shopping centres at Havant and Leigh Park.In Havant the main shop is Waitrose.It is often packed with people although it only sells food.Next door is another popular shop,Centre News.It is a news shop that sells toys,books and magazines.There is a pedestrian precinct in West Street with shops like Boots,a nationwide chemist and Martin a news shop.There are also two arcades of small shops. Leigh Park is a pedestrian precinct of many small shops and 3 large ones. The biggest shop in the area is Havant Hypermarket which sells many things including clothes and food.Although Havant has many small stores it lacks many big ones like Marks and Spencers and Sainsburys.
